response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I propose a special introductory offer for you. If you decide to purchase now, you can acquire this product for $13,500. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic worth but also my commitment to fostering long-term relationships with valued clients like yourself. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 13500}
